name: Vega and the Cult Of Dead Bunnies
name_original: Vega and the Cult Of Dead Bunnies
description:
A small crossover game. Turret Jumper (by Future Games, me) meets The Cult Of The Dead Bunnies: FUNTIME (by OrfeasWorldGames Studio). Mouse to move. Click to shoot (only 1 bullet). Don't die! (On loss it contains some small Turret Jumper lore).

THIS GAME HAS BEEN APPROVED BY THE ORFEASWORLDGAMES STUDIO TEAM.

Developed by Future Games. Published by Future Games and OrfeasWorldGames Studio.
